events.title: Classical Vocal Evening with Ravindra Parchure
events.artist: Ravindra Parchure (Vocals), Sumity Naik (Tabla), Tejas Katoti (Harmonium)
events.description: Join us for an enchanting evening of Hindustani classical vocals featuring the talented Ravindra Parchure, accompanied by Sumity Naik on tabla and Tejas Katoti on harmonium. Experience the depth and beauty of classical ragas in our intimate baithak setting.

events.title: Sitar Recital by Nikhil Patwardhan
events.description: A mesmerizing sitar recital by Nikhil Patwardhan, accompanied by the rhythmic maestro Sumit Naik on tabla. An unforgettable evening of classical music that resonated with every attendee.

events.title: Carnatic Fusion - Mridangam & Mandolin
events.description: A unique fusion evening featuring the powerful rhythms of Anghiras on mridangam complemented by the melodious mandolin of Srijith. An exploration of Carnatic traditions with contemporary expressions.

events.title: Harmonium Solo by Tanmay Deochake
events.description: An extraordinary harmonium solo performance by Tanmay Deochake, showcasing the versatility and expressive range of this beloved instrument. A rare treat for classical music enthusiasts.

events.title: Sitar & Tabla Duet
events.description: A captivating sitar performance by Malvica Chopra, beautifully complemented by the rhythmic artistry of Kaushik Bhat on tabla. An evening that celebrated the timeless tradition of classical Indian music.

events.title: Classical Vocal Evening with Hrithik Adlakha
events.artist: Hrithik Adlakha (Vocals), Tejas Katoti (Harmonium), Sumit Naik (Tabla)
events.description: An evening of sublime Hindustani classical vocals by Hrithik Adlakha, accompanied by Tejas Katoti on harmonium and Sumit Naik on tabla. A memorable performance that showcased the beauty of traditional ragas.
